page.title: GOVERNMENT
page.content:
TWG’s Government solutions accomplishing the mission

For decades accomplishing the mission by delivering field-trusted-proven designs and custom engineered solutions that meets today’s challenges in the field and saving lives.

TWG’s Government solutions accomplishing the mission

For decades accomplishing the mission by delivering field-trusted-proven designs and custom engineered solutions that meets today’s challenges in the field and saving lives.

About TWG’s government program

TWG is the leading global provider of gearing and electronic systems for hydraulic winches, hoists and rotation systems. TWG’s DP Winch brand is the number one supplier of hydraulic planetary gear winches for the United States defense industry and foreign governments around the world.

Since 1970 DP winch has fielded more than 75,000 winches on military vehicles – from heavy equipment tank transporters and assault vehicles to wreckers and over-the-road tractors.

Read Report

About TWG’s government program

TWG is the leading global provider of gearing and electronic systems for hydraulic winches, hoists and rotation systems. TWG’s DP Winch brand is the number one supplier of hydraulic planetary gear winches for the United States defense industry and foreign governments around the world.

Since 1970 DP winch has fielded more than 75,000 winches on military vehicles – from heavy equipment tank transporters and assault vehicles to wreckers and over-the-road tractors.

Read Report

TWG’s government program overview

DP Winch is a supplier of government winches and provides complete logistics support for numerous Defense industry programs, including: M916, HEMTT, HETM1070, PLS, FMTV, MTVR, LVS, LVSR, M983, LET HLVM and the remanufacture programs for SECREPS and RESET.

  • Nearly 75,000 winches fielded Worldwide
  • All items are assigned NSNs
  • Extensive remanufacturing capabilities
  • dp Winch Heavy Recovery Units
  • dp Winch Traction Technology

TWG’s government program overview

DP Winch is a supplier of government winches and provides complete logistics support for numerous Defense industry programs, including: M916, HEMTT, HETM1070, PLS, FMTV, MTVR, LVS, LVSR, M983, LET HLVM and the remanufacture programs for SECREPS and RESET.

  • Nearly 75,000 winches fielded Worldwide
  • All items are assigned NSNs
  • Extensive remanufacturing capabilities
  • dp Winch Heavy Recovery Units
  • dp Winch Traction Technology

TWG government capabilities

DP Winch manufactures a complete line of hydraulic and planetary gear winches, capstans, and bumper packages for major Original Equipment Manufacturers and the Defense industry.

TWG government capabilities

DP Winch manufactures a complete line of hydraulic and planetary gear winches, capstans, and bumper packages for major Original Equipment Manufacturers and the Defense industry.

DP winch hydraulic recovery winch system

  • 14,000-20,000 Lbs. Line Pull
  • All testing is complete and test reports are available for review.
  • Winch operates with either synthetic rope (Masterpull) or conventional steel cable.
  • Automatic brake
  • Drum free spool by use of manual lever
  • Capable of operating at temperature between -40°C and 52°C.
  • Removable remote control with 5 meter cord
  • Weight: 130 lbs. without rope
  • Efficient planetary gear system
  • Robust design heritage-US approved and battle tested

DP winch hydraulic recovery winch system

  • 14,000-20,000 Lbs. Line Pull
  • All testing is complete and test reports are available for review.
  • Winch operates with either synthetic rope (Masterpull) or conventional steel cable.
  • Automatic brake
  • Drum free spool by use of manual lever
  • Capable of operating at temperature between -40°C and 52°C.
  • Removable remote control with 5 meter cord
  • Weight: 130 lbs. without rope
  • Efficient planetary gear system
  • Robust design heritage-US approved and battle tested

Pullmaster 30KM side mount recovery winch 30,000 lb. line pull

  • Currently installed on LMCO Havoc
  • Manual or air operated drum freespool
  • Allows deployment of rope front and rear of vehicle
  • Accepts wire or synthetic rope
  • Fully tested to government standards – SAE J706 – TOP 2-2-172
  • Commonality of parts within NSN system
  • Meets all requirements of Canadian MSVS contract.

Pullmaster 30KM side mount recovery winch 30,000 lb. line pull

  • Currently installed on LMCO Havoc
  • Manual or air operated drum freespool
  • Allows deployment of rope front and rear of vehicle
  • Accepts wire or synthetic rope
  • Fully tested to government standards – SAE J706 – TOP 2-2-172
  • Commonality of parts within NSN system
  • Meets all requirements of Canadian MSVS contract.

DP winch model 35

As government technology advances in the 21st century, dp Winch has worked to develop the next generation of recovery winch technology. The engineering philosophy of dp Winch is simple; make the design uncomplicated, make it out of the highest quality parts, and deliver a winching system that can withstand the most challenging environments. dp Winch offers several models to meet the needs of today’s diverse military applications. dp Winch also produces a number of standard and custom specialty component products.

  • Contemporary design minimizes space requirements
  • Reduced weight – 281 lbs.
  • Fully tested to government standards – TOP 2-2-172
  • Commonality of parts within NSN system

Gear products stainless steel turret bearing

With over 40 years of experience and knowledge, Gear Products’ turret bearings have the durability that you need and can depend on. Our turret bearings are commonly used in the Government, Infrastructure, Recovery, Energy & Marine markets custom-built for each application.

  • 100% Stainless Steel Construction to withstand the harshest of conditions
  • Bearing is capable of operating at -45 Celsius
  • Low-torque rotation bearing for manual operation Custom engineered
  • Very low friction
  • Thin cross section for low moment applications
